text.autoconfig.nmc.title: No Man's Config
A random number between 0 and 100 will be generated.
If it's lower than this value, the planet will have oxygen.
text.autoconfig.nmc.option.largeWorldCha: A random number between 0 and 100 will be generated.
If it's lower than this value, the planet will have large biomes.
text.autoconfig.nmc.option.amplifiedWorl: A random number between 0 and 100 will be generated.
If it's lower than this value, the planet will be amplified.
text.autoconfig.nmc.option.stormyPlanetC: A random number between 0 and 100 will be generated.
If it's lower than this value, the planet will be a stormy planet.
text.autoconfig.nmc.option.floatingIslan: A random number between 0 and 100 will be generated.
If it's lower or equals to this value, the planet will be floating island.
text.autoconfig.nmc.option.particleChanc: A random number between 0 and 100 will be generated.
If it's lower or equals to this value, the planet will have custom ambient particle.
text.autoconfig.nmc.option.minBiomes.@To: A random number between Minimum and Maximum biomes will be generated.
This will be the number of biomes on the planet.
